Name: Armor
Details: Armor equipped on a 'Mech is used to protect its vital internal structure, as well as its weapons, ammo, and other critical systems. Damaged armor does not stop a 'Mech from dropping, but needs to be repaired after battle to keep the 'Mech at an optimal fighting condition. A location's underlying structure can only support a certain amount of armor, depending on the 'Mech's weight class.
